meanings.definition: A large beer mug, typically made of stoneware or glass.
meanings.sent1: At the Oktoberfest, the bartender filled the stein with frothy beer.
meanings.sent2: He collected antique steins from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter tripped and spilled the contents of the stein all over himself.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the tavern, bouncing off the walls like a stein.
meanings.sent5: The stein gleamed under the dim lights, inviting everyone to take a sip.

meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to two quarts.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for a stein of milk to make the pudding.
meanings.sent2: She poured a stein of water into the pot for cooking.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly added a stein of salt instead of sugar to the dish.
meanings.sent4: His thirst was so great that he drank a stein of lemonade in one go.
meanings.sent5: The stein of oil overflowed, causing a mess in the kitchen.
